snippet.title: Invertigo - New Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Invertigo on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1659520/Invertigo/

Invertigo is a first-person sci-fi puzzle-platformer where you have to manipulate gravity to solve puzzles. Explore the abandoned facility and make use of gravity manipulation to advance through the rooms.
